body_html:
Tnanks for response
TensorFlow 1.8
Was running on collab

The issue solved already,
probably caused by "failed to assign a backend GPU"

I've tried as well
!pip uninstall tf-nightly
!pip uninstall tensorflow
and then
!pip install --upgrade tensorflow

a magic happened and it works

body:
Tnanks for response
TensorFlow 1.8
Was running on collab

The issue solved already,
probably caused by "failed to assign a backend GPU"

I've tried as well
!pip uninstall tf-nightly
!pip uninstall  tensorflow
and then 
!pip install --upgrade tensorflow

 a magic happened and it works
